blocks.headline: TinaCMS + Jekyll = ❤️
blocks.text: Harness the strength of Markdown and Git to enhance your Jekyll projects with TinaCMS.

blocks.content:
## Bring TinaCMS into Your Jekyll Workflow

Integrate TinaCMS into your Jekyll projects and enjoy the advantages of markdown content and Git-backed version control.

items.headline: Markdown Support
items.text: Easily create and manage content with Markdown, a format perfectly suited for Jekyll. TinaCMS simplifies the process and enhances productivity.

items.headline: Git-Backed Version Control
items.text: With TinaCMS, all your content is stored in Git, providing the best version control system. This makes tracking changes and managing different versions a breeze.

items.headline: Flexible and Customizable
items.text: TinaCMS offers a high level of flexibility and customization options, allowing you to shape your Jekyll project to fit your unique requirements.

blocks.headline: Boost Your Jekyll Project
blocks.text: Experience the benefits of TinaCMS for your Jekyll workflow.

seo.title: TinaCMS + Jekyll: Enhance Your Workflow
seo.description: Bring the power of Markdown and Git into your Jekyll projects with TinaCMS. Experience a seamless, highly customizable content management solution.
